items.question: How quickly can I mute audio from my videos?
items.answer: Audio muting is incredibly fast, usually completed in under a minute depending on the video length. The AI processes the audio in real-time.

items.question: Can I preview the audio before and after muting?
items.answer: Yes! You can listen to a preview of both the original and edited audio tracks to ensure satisfaction with the result.

items.question: Is there a limit to the file size I can upload?
items.answer: Currently, our platform supports video file uploads up to 4GB. Make sure your videos meet this requirement for seamless editing.

items.question: What formats do you support for video uploads?
items.answer: We support various formats including MP4, MOV, and AVI for optimal processing. Ensure your files are in these formats to avoid issues.

items.question: Can I mute multiple sections of audio in one video?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can choose to mute multiple audio tracks or sections within a video according to your needs.

items.question: Do I retain ownership of the edited videos?
items.answer: Yes! You maintain full ownership of the videos edited using our platform, including the audio content.

items.question: What quality can I expect from the audio after muting?
items.answer: The quality remains high, and background noise removal enhances the clarity of your remaining audio. Expect professional-grade sound.

items.question: Can I edit audio if I'm not a professional?
items.answer: Yes! Our tool is designed for ease of use, so anyone can navigate the audio muting process without prior experience.

items.question: What technical support is available if I experience issues?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive support via email and live chat, with a detailed FAQ and troubleshooting guides on our website.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the audio muting results?
items.answer: We encourage users to make full use of the preview feature to ensure satisfaction. If issues arise, our support team is ready to assist.
